response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its worth to you, I aim to find a fair exchange. Considering its high quality and utility, I propose a price of $12,000 for it. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise between the perceived value to you and my asking price. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.", "product_price": 12000}
